lithium.community.android.sdk.auth

Class LiAuthServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • lithium.community.android.sdk.auth.LiAuthServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LiAuthService

    public class LiAuthServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LiAuthService
    Implementation class for LiAuthService. Starts login flow, performs authorization, fetches access and refresh tokens. Created by shoureya.kant on 9/12/16.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface lithium.community.android.sdk.auth.LiAuthService
